definition: a submersible warship usually armed with torpedoes

positive_examples: This is an example of submarine.
We observed submarine in this context.
A typical case of submarine would involve these features.
The concept of submarine applies here.
A military vessel capable of operating underwater for extended periods.
negative_examples: This is an example of aircraft carrier, not submarine.
This represents military ship in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AircraftCarrier, or other types of MilitaryShip
